programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. When Gumball objects he is told that even the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law. In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them "procrastinators", once shes told them what it means. They promise to take the trash out by the time she gets home. As the clock slowly counts down, they discover that they will go to extraordinary lengths, no matter how inane, to avoid the task in hand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. They discover that under Pennys shell is an emotional shape-shifting inner self. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it, despite Darwins advice. / Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster, Chris Morris, to look after for the weekend. / When Darwin and Gumball reveal how theyd spend their perfect day, Gumball confesses that he would spend it with Penny. / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Cody gets a super cool, new t-shirt. Its SO cool that the kids dont even recognize him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. But their quest for perfect wig hair drives them to weird and dangerous lengths.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced tooutwit himself in order to get his cake back.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld!

programme.title: Craig of the Creek

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Animation based on the DC Comics fictional superhero team, the Teen Titans. Robin continues to lust after the beautiful Starfire. In a misguided attempt to get her attention - and her affection - he decides to become a cat in the hope that she will love him in feline form.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Animation based on the DC Comics fictional superhero team, the Teen Titans. After their poor leg strength leads them to face defeat in battle, Raven and the other Titans hit the gym to build up their lower bodies.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: Beast Boy gets a stack of cash from the Tooth Fairy. So, against Ravens advice, the other Titans start knocking out their own teeth to get some of that sweet T.

programme.title: Hiidteismelised
programme.desc: A giant cocoon mysteriously appears in the Titans living room, and no one can find Beast Boy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Yogi goes on an epic pirate adventure to get a replacement of his favorite chair.

programme.title: Jellystone!
programme.desc: Cindy creates an elaborate history of a fake civilization to cover an embarrassing mistake.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Bobert finds hes infected with a virus called love.exe he asks Gumball and Darwin to give him a definition for the word love. When they try to explain it through song, it gets him no closer to an answer, so he asks the other residents of Elmore to give their versions of what love means to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.desc: Owen wants his favorite treat, Jiggle Giggle, so bad that hes willing to use a time machine to get to snacktime quicker. But when he ends up stuck in the past, Owen must decide between getting home and getting fed.

programme.title: Total DramaRama

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin put Anais new friend -- Josh -- through a series of tests, to see if hes good enough for their sister. However, when the boys extreme methods start freaking Josh out, he questions whether being Anaiss friend is worth the trouble. So Gumball and Darwin end up having to convince Josh to give Anais a second chance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are convinced its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore in search of adventure, it becomes apparent exciting things are happening just not to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologize for past misdeeds and hopefully to procure an antidote... before its too late!

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Izzy cant bring herself to smash a Pinata during the class Cinco De Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed Pinata comes to life and spawns an evil Pinata Army, its batter up.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a Hide and Seek competition, theyre trapped on a private island by a jealous former champion and forced to play for their freedom.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. Craig is assigned to create a poster on what autumn (fall) means to him - thinking that it is boring, he gets support from his mother Nicole, who asks him to talk about what he thinks of when it comes to autumn. Craig then proceeds to recall stories about seasonal desserts, windy hills, moongazing, chapped lips and diving into a pile of leaves.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Animated comedy following the adventures of Craig and his two friends Kelsey and JP as they explore the wilderness of the creek together. However, while Craig is happy with his bug-like snacks, he becomes demoralised by everyone elses dishes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball kind of teaches Darwin how to be a skater… / Darwin finds it harder than expected to give up his favourite foodstuff. / Gumball becomes a sorcerers apprentice / Gumball Darwin and Anais find themselves plunged into an RPG version of Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball is given a cursed video-game console Elmore becomes trapped inside a fantasy RPG world. Gumball, Darwin and Anais have to battle their way through town, unravelling the secrets of their new virtual reality. But theyll have to level up if theyre going to stand any chance against the mysterious final boss...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The family go to visit Richards Dad. Based on his basic living standards and extended absence from Richards life, they assume Frankie must have done a stretch in the slammer. When Frankie comes to stay with the Wattersons, they decide the way to make him comfortable is to make him uncomfortable and turn their house into a prison.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are confused when they meet Kiki and Quack, a pair of siblings that copy everything they do and say. Then they find out this copycat family is making money online from imitating the Watterson family! When they fail to encourage them to find their own identity, the Wattersons realise they need a more permanent solution...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin realise Grandpa Louie has no friends on Elmore Plus, they feel bad. So they create one - called Muriel. However when Granny Jojo finds out Louie has been spending time online with another woman, Muriel not existing isnt going to stop her being destroyed.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Dad gives Larrys Hairdressers a bad review for saying hes bald, he gets offered a free haircut. This inspires Gumball and Darwin to go on a reviewing-spree across town, forcing Larry to give them stuff with the threat of a bad review. Just because the customer is always right doesnt mean that what theyre doing isnt wrong.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons receive an unmarked package in the mail. To distract themselves from the urge to open it, they all take turns to imagine what it might contain. To Mom it could mean financial freedom, to Gumball it could mean superpowers: to whoever its actually for, it means theyre not getting their package.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.sub-title: The Tag / The Party / The Man / The Microwave
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party, and have to bring a date! / Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Miss Simian discovers a failed test from Gumballs past that brings down his grade point average. This means he has to retake kindergarten all over again, much to her delight. But by demoting him Miss Simian has inadvertently brought herself down, and theyre left with no choice but to team up if they want things back to normal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball almost loses his mind trying to guess Darwins secret.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After a health scare the kids decide to reunite Mr Robinson with his son. Mr Robinson has always seen Rocky as a disappointment so when Gumball and Darwin help him land a corporate job at Chanax, he is thrilled. However the Chanax corporation is not quite what it seems. Can Gumball and Darwin rescue Rocky before he becomes a corporate drone for all eternity?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. When Gumball objects he is told that even the smallest misdemeanour can lead to a breakdown in law. In an effort to impress the kids Donut Cop takes them for a ride-along in his cop car and gets carried away, progressively breaking the law himself. He soon proves that the tiniest offense can indeed snowball into complete lawlessness!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he cant stop. The Wattersons figure maybe hes allergic to something. After a few guesses, they come to the conclusion that he is allergic to stupidity. Being surrounded by stupid people, this is something of a problem. And they need to find a solution before Darwins increasingly explosive sneezes destroy the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Mothers Day, and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for "The Best Mom in the World". Clearly Nicole Watterson is the Best Mom, but Tobias and BJ just wont admit it... So they organise a mom-off at the mall between Nicole, Banana Barbara and Jackie Wilson. Needless to say it gets pretty intense.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them "procrastinators", once shes told them what it means. They promise to take the trash out by the time she gets home. As the clock slowly counts down, they discover that they will go to extraordinary lengths, no matter how inane, to avoid the task in hand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: While performing a school play, Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally headbutts her and cracks open her shell. They discover that under Pennys shell is an emotional shape-shifting inner self. Pennys father is determined for Penny to keep it hidden but Gumball encourages her to show the world who, or what, she really is.

Darwin gets jealous and sets out to dig some dirt on Penny, hoping it will split them up. Meanwhile Gumball is planning to step his and Pennys relationship up a notch, by proposing marriage!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Granny Jojo has brought a boyfriend to her birthday meal and Dad isnt happy about it. He bans Granny JoJo from ever seeing Louis again. When the kids get caught sneaking Granny Jojo out of the house, Dad challenges Louis to a man-off to prove once and for all who is the man of the house?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry. When they call to complain about their late pizza its the final straw for Larry and he quits all of his jobs. Elmores fragile commercial structure collapses and the citizens revert to a more primitive apocalyptic state.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. The whole town embrace this festival and get excited about the arrival of the Sluzzle Dude; leaving it to Gumball and Anais to keep everyones Sluzzle Tag dreams alive.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. Miss Simian warns them about the Butterfly Effect whereby the flap of an insects wings can start a tornado on the other side of the world. Paying no heed, Gumball releases the emergent butterfly into the wild, where it causes havoc upon Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Things keep going missing in the house, so its up to Gumball and Darwin to find the culprit. They discover that a mysterious person has been secretly living in their home. Gumball and Darwin manage to turn this confused squatter into their mortal enemy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. However events conspire against him, and Gumball learns that sometimes you cant fight fate.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Rocky suggests that the Elmore Junior High kids skip school, the bus is boarded by criminals who seem to want to teach them the importance of school attendance. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Richards got a motorcycle helmet stuck on his head, so when he goes into a bank the terrified staff all assume hes there to rob the place and hand over a load of cash. Richard leaves with the money, completely oblivious to the fact hes just performed a stick-up. Nicole and the kids soon tell him what hes done and try to figure out a way to avoid the police manhunt and return the cash.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Leslies petals begin falling off he feels like his good looks are fading, Gumball and Darwin use everything they know about style and beauty to try and help him. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.desc: After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once hes big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey whos run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozmas help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they dont seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Theres a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glindas protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witchs wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glindas steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, its up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else its curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that shes been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelminas castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a new bookcase but it is missing one vital element! / Mr Bean takes Teddy on a seaside holiday but a precocious child decides she should be Teddys best and only friend! / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. / Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero "Super Spy" and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean inadvertently causes an accident which prevents Irma taking the scout troop to Big Bears Scout Camp. With the scout master and mini bus out of action Mr Bean steps in to save the day. As temporary scoutmaster Mr Bean enjoys his new role but his obsessive badge collecting wins him no friends within the group.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. / Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert. / Mr Bean inadvertently becomes a teacher. Can he control the unruly class? / Mr Bean finds out he is a Lord and visits his Scottish family home. But keeping a castle is a costly business.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. / Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. / Mr Bean finally has a showdown with the mysterious Reliant Robin. Who will be the victor? / Mr Bean has to get the bride to the church on time...anyway he can!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A musical tribute to Ace, the super-brave bat-hound!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has some competition with Nightwings motorcycle, Nightbike. Always trying to one-up each other, these stunt bikes will need to learn that theyre better when they work together.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Ducky and Quizz steal the Bat-Signals one-of-a-kind lightbulb, Bam and Batwing must find a way to restore the legendary light so Batman knows when Gotham needs him.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Findley cant resist some freshly baked cookies that are too hot to eat.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Avocados new toy is driving everyone crazy with its noisy squeaker. Lucas tells everyone that hes going to speak to her. Its now that he realizes Avocado loves everything about her squeaky toy apart from the actual squeak itself! So, Dr Lucas is in the house to operate and remove the squeak.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas performs epic jumps all around House. Findley is nervous and wishes Lucas wouldnt jump.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is up to his usual nonsense, but two can play at this game as they take their chase into the neighbourhood. Leave it to Jerry to turn the tables on Tom!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mel grows frustrated with the things she cant do while wearing a cast, Barney creates an imaginative game for the kids to play. Throughout the game, Mel learns to embrace her abilities with the help of a fantastical robot arm.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels pretzel is eaten by a pigeon, Barney creates a high-seas adventure to find another, but it goes awry when Captain Mel doesnt listen to her crew. Mel realizes its important to listen to others when youre working as a team.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Barney the purple dinosaur introduces himself and takes us on a tour of the super-dee-super park! He dances, demonstrates how to take a Barney Breath, and shows off some of his fun Barney magic!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger is in charge of taking care of her mothers bird./ Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. / Rick leaves Spike in charge of protecting the house against burglars./ Dr Bigby creates a machine to turn back the hands of time for his belovedcat Wilson. / Tuffy hires detectives Tom and Jerry to investigate ghost hauntings./Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Butch tricks Tom into switching places with him and sends Tom off to live the life of a street cat. Butch finds out that living Toms cushy life isnt what it seems when Jerry makes his life difficult and Gingers doting is humiliating. Tom finds that living off the street is tricky and difficult. They very quickly switch back to the way it was.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory./ Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. / After a particularly destructive chase Tom and Spike have to go to the vet./ Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches spell before sundown. / Tom kicks Spikes beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence./ Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing their customers.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When it seems like Spike has developed an allergic reaction to Tom Rick buys Ginger a hypoallergetic cat named Glory./ Dr. Bigby creates cookies that can give animals superpowers. / After a particularly destructive chase Tom and Spike have to go to the vet./ Tom and Jerry have to go retrieve an ingredient for the witches spell before sundown. / Tom kicks Spikes beloved chew toy Ruggles over the fence./ Butch and a squirrel detective have set up shop across the street from Tom and Jerry and are stealing their customers.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of… a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Frustrated by the Batwheels distracting affinity for holiday festivities, Batwing decides to "go solo" to thwart Mr. Freezes evil Christmas-time plots. However, Batwing and the Batwheels soon realize that stopping Mr. Freeze is much harder when they all arent working together as a team.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After the rest of the Batwheels are incapacitated and Gothams beloved holiday mascot, Ike Cicle, is captured by Mr. Freeze, Batwing realizes that going solo isnt all its cracked up to be. Now its up to her to rescue her friends, and work with them to save Christmas in Gotham.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about finding solutions that work for all.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new "friend" has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Barney the purple dinosaur introduces himself and takes us on a tour of the super-dee-super park! He dances, demonstrates how to take a Barney Breath, and shows off some of his fun Barney magic!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated. Its up to Morel to step up and finally teach Lilit how to slack-vine like a pro.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Vivie wants to show Nonna her special chalk drawing, but everyones attention is on Mels cast so Vivie fakes an injury to get attention too. When her plan falls through, Barney helps Vivie learn the value in speaking up for what she needs.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivie discovers shes not amazing at soccer the first time she tries, she thinks shell never be good at it. Barney creates fantastical practice drills to help Vivie learn how practice can help her get better.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about what games they like to play.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Music Meister is stealing the singing voices of all the people in Gotham. Now its up to bashful Buff to gain confidence in his voice and use it to take down Music Meister.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl. Redbird gets excited when he learns that Batman and Robin are taking him and Bam for a drive up the coast - unfortunately, the Joker and his van Prank show up unexpectedly and ruin Redbirds beach day plans.

programme.title: Karbikool
programme.desc: The bugs talk about finding solutions that work for all.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Arlo is missing his mother, so Lucas gives him a bell to ring if he needs Lucass help - bad idea.

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: "Maizie" keeps ignoring Lucas and Findley, but not only do they learn she has a cousin - they also learn a new skill!

programme.title: Lucas the Spider
programme.desc: Lucas befriends a bright pink toy spider and Findley gets jealous.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Baby Bop is playing a game of hide and seek behind the Barney Bench! With a little Barney magic, she shows off a couple of her dress-up costumes and skills, all while celebrating her fabulous self.

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Up to their usual antics, Tom, Jerry and Spike get into monkey business with a drone at Rick and Gingers house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, hes determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The Lady of the Manors prize Pomeranian, Alfred, must get some pounds off before the big dog show. The butler suggests exercise—chasing a cat perhaps? Tom happily obliges, as Alfreds successful weight loss guarantees him a cushy spot upstairs. Meanwhile, Jerry aims to sabotage Toms efforts.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger go to a couples retreat, they leave Tom with Ricks Auntie Louella. Hearing that shes a whiz in the kitchen, Jerry comes along. The old woman is sweet, but she has a nasty little lap dog that bedevils Tom like crazy. Louella keeps treating Tom poorly, and Tom and Jerry make their plans to escape.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Pipeline: Tom and Jerry accidentally lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain. No Brain No Gain: Dr. Bigby creates an amazing helmet that accidentally turns Tom into a genius. / Tom breaks his leg during a chase. / Hildie and Beatie are fed up with Tom and threaten to get a real witches cat: a black cat. / When the pets believe that they are going to run out of food during a snowstorm, they start hoarding.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid. Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Mr Bean

Its gardening gloves off when Mr Bean goes into battle with his rival green-fingered competitors.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own "No Littering" signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories dont always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a "date" to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Puff and our Mushlers set out to try and find out what Fung and Miffs special gifts are without them knowing.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Fung finds out that to earn a delicious treat from Sushi-Mushi you just need to look after the Food Snail for him. No problem! Actually, it becomes a huge problem for Fung!

programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion - the King of the Forest - to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lions ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lions ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking hes a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Toks voice mechanism isnt working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Mans jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: If I Only Had Some Brawn
programme.desc: Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the centre. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk - but at the price of his brain-power. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozmas maze, Scarecrow must get back his intellect to save the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Its Musical Monday and the Beast Royales are going to perform! The Beast Royales are the most popular band in Oz and a mob of Fans follows them everywhere they go. Wilhelmina is their number one fan so she sends Frank and Lyman to kidnap them so they can play for her instead! Dorothy Tin Man Scarecrow Lion and Toto arent about to let Wilhelmina spoil the party and mount a hair-raising rescue so that the band can get back to the castle to perform.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wilhelmina tries to sneak into the Emerald Castle and steal Dorothys ruby slippers while she sleeps, but her plan fails. So Wilhelmina uses a magic hourglass to go back in time and try it over and over again. But every time she gets close to the slippers, Toto is there to thwart Wilhelminas plans.

programme.title: Mr Bean

Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr Bean

But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

Except that the entire volcanic island shudders each time the drops are poured. Grizzy, who has decided to take a nap in his hammock, confiscates the bottle before realizing that the Lemmings have an entire stock !

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. programme.desc: Tom falls asleep inside a rolled-up carpet left out on the curb by Rick with a "free" sign attached. When the new owners unload their pickup truck and leave the carpet in front of their home, a sleepy Tom doesnt notice at first that everything is similar to, but a little different than, his usual surroundings. Soon Tom feels that hes landed in bizarro world.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a series of beatings from Tom, Jerry storms off into his mouse hole. Soon he falls asleep and dreams himself to be the Lord of Downton Abbey! Tom is now servant to Lord Jerry, and the Master wastes no time in making Toms life miserable. Tom is caught in the act of exacting revenge, so Lord Jerry challenges Tom to a duel in the dream world.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerrys mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriends friend for a double date.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Pipeline: Tom and Jerry accidentally lose Gingers wedding ring down the drain. No Brain No Gain: Dr. Bigby creates an amazing helmet that accidentally turns Tom into a genius. / Tom breaks his leg during a chase. / Hildie and Beatie are fed up with Tom and threaten to get a real witches cat: a black cat. / When the pets believe that they are going to run out of food during a snowstorm, they start hoarding.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Determined to finish Beethovens symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra - and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: When the frogspawn in Mr. Beans bath hatch out, its the last thing his landlady needs, especially when shes invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that wont stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder. In seventh heaven, the rodents start over again, this time using the TV satellite dish. But Grizzy, determined to get the dish back at any cost, must confront the magnetism of the meteorite and the fury of the Lemmings, for the rodents are set on playing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: By chance, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a container filled with metal survival food flasks. Primarily filled with vegetables, they do not find favor with the bear, who is more interested in the hi-tech equipment at the rear of the container. Behind his back, the Lemmings find a flask of Yummy and skedaddle with it. But how will they escape Grizzy equipped with his sophisticated gear?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: A musical montage features the Joker, Gothams most prickling prankster, as he causes trouble big and small for Batman, the Batwheels, and Gothamites alike!

programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song and need to learn to harmonise to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr Bean

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their "relaxing" holiday!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. Every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it has disappeared. Someone is taking it, but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

Nad on pisikesed metsavalvurid ja igal seenemikul on mingi eriline anne: Mikk-Mikk oskab loodusega suhelda, Lilit sarab eredalt ja Kubarapoisilile jaab kõik hasti meelde.
