programme.title: Oma tõde
programme.desc: Kuidas on lood Eestis teeninduskultuuriga? Paljude vaidete kohaselt on see juba mõnda aega olnud langustrendis. Mida eeldab kelneri elukutse ja kuidas naevad olukorda omanikud ning kliendid? Saatejuht on Jelena Solomina.

programme.title: Auguste Escoffier ehk moodsa gastronoomia sunnilugu
programme.desc: Gastronoomia ehk peenkokakunst sundis umbes sajandi eest tanu uhele prantslasele. Mitmetes luksushotellides tootanud legendaarne meisterkokk Auguste Escoffier moderniseeris Prantsuse kokakunsti ja muutis selle maailmakuulsaks. Tema elutoo on inspireerinud paljusid geniaalseid kokkasid ule kogu maailma.

programme.title: Maailm pahupidi
programme.desc: Seekordne sihtkoht on indiaani kula, kus Dmitri teeb labi iidse ayahuasca riituse, mis peaks looma sideme loodusvaimudega ja andma uliinimlikud võimed. Selleks tuleb juua erilise retsepti jargi valmistatud šamaanijooki, mis koosneb ainult kolmest komponendist, aga millel on maagiline vagi.

programme.title: Ajalugu viie minutiga
programme.desc: See sari tutvustab vaatajatele inimesi, sundmuseid ja ideid, mis on toonud maailma vaga suuri muutuseid.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Manuel ja Jimena tulitsevad, kuna mees viis Blanca lendama. Cruzi plaan paruness kõrvaldada kukub labi. Candela utleb Píale, et teab, kes ta lapse tegelik isa on. Tudrukud kingivad Simonale teatripiletid, et too Candelaga teatrisse laheks.

programme.title: Isa Brown
programme.desc: 14 aastat tagasi 14-aastase Maggie tapnud Ned Hannigan leitakse parast vanglast vabanemist surnuna metsast. Sundmuskohalt avastatud sõrmejalgede põhjal vahistab inspektor Mallory Ned Hannigani ema. Isa Browni vaevab kusimus, miks tuli Hannigan parast karistuse kandmist tagasi Kemblefordi.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: "Aktuaalne kaamera" on Eesti Televisiooni igapaevane eestikeelne uudistesaade.

programme.title: Õnnemajake
programme.desc: Maks ostab nuku, et koos Mašaga lapsevanemaks olemist harjutada, ent kaotab "lapse" ara. Maša mõlgib ara Maksi auto ega julge ules tunnistada. Ljuba ja Vasja võtavad samuti lapsetegemise ette.

programme.title: Jalg
programme.desc: Parast rahvakunstifestivalilt naasmist leitakse ansambli Vooke bussi pagasiruumist surnukeha. Tapetu on ansambli Kõristid solist Jaroslav Zagrebin, kes on pillikeelega surnuks kagistatud. Ühe Vookese muusiku balalaikalt on puudu just seesama keel...

programme.title: Horisont
programme.desc: Sundmused, inimesed, nahtused, vestlused kuulsate kulalistega. Eestist ja meid umbritsevast maailmast. Saatejuhid on Alina Privalova ja Aleksandr Žemžurov.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: "Aktuaalne kaamera" on Eesti Televisiooni igapaevane eestikeelne uudistesaade.

programme.title: Nadala intervjuu
programme.desc: Avameelne vestlus paevakajalistel ja Eesti elanikke erutavatel teemadel. Stuudiokulalisega arutatakse nadala tahtsamaid sundmusi ja puutakse saada vastuseid ka ebamugavatele kusimustele. Saatejuhid Tatjana Gassova ja Nikolai Loštšin, režissoor Dmitri Hljupin, produtsent Tiina Koljak.

programme.title: Peegel
programme.desc: "Peegel" keskendub inimeste aitamisele ja nende õiguste kaitsele. Kui te naiteks ei ole rahul teile pakutava teenusega, teile on muudud praaktoode või tehakse teile ulekohut, siis helistage telefonil 5454 0505 või kirjutage meiliaadressile zerkalo@err.ee ja me tuleme teile appi!

programme.title: Kasakad. Labi ja lõhki valjamõeldud lugu
programme.desc: Koševoiataman sõidab kulasse kellatorni avamisele ja Ivan teeb nii, et Zubrik ka tema peole toimetaks. Seiklusrikkal teekonnal kohtub Ivan taas Marjanaga. Nazar avastab, et vend Ihor on kadunud. Ta saadab kasakad venda otsima, ise aga peab plaani Zaporižžja Sitšist lahkuda, et abielluda armastatud Marjanaga.

programme.title: Esimesed paasukesed
programme.desc: Politseiuurija jõuab kiiresti jareldusele, et Ivani surma puhul on tegemist enesetapuga, ja lõpetab uurimise. Viimased sõnumid Ivani telefonis on sõpradelt, tudruksõbralt ja kelleltki Sõbralt. Kas tõesti jalle "Esimesed paasukesed"? Kira otsustab ise asja uurima hakata. Ta teeb tudengitele ettepaneku panna kirja oma versioon toimunust ja valib neli paremat ideed valja pakkunut koos endaga ajakirjanduslikku uurimist labi viima.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: "Aktuaalne kaamera" on Eesti Televisiooni igapaevane eestikeelne uudistesaade.

programme.title: Titaan
programme.desc: R: Lennart Ruff. O: Sam Worthington, Tom Wilkinson. Lahitulevikus seisab inimkond fakti ees, et nende koduplaneeti varsti enam ei eksisteeri. Õhujõudude piloot Rick Janssen koos ruhma valjavalitutega nõustub osalema salajases geneetilises eksperimendis, mis uurib teooriat, kas teatud liikide DNA siirdamine katsealustele annab inimestele võimaluse ule elada Titaani-nimelise planeedi karmid tingimused. Peagi selgub, et esialgu edukalt kulgevad katsed toovad kaasa kõrvalmõjusid, mida keegi ei osanud ette naha. Lennart Ruffi ulmepõneviku peaosades on "Avatari" staar Sam Worthington ja kahekordne Oscari nominent Tom Wilkinson ("Michael Clayton").

programme.title: Esimesed paasukesed

programme.title: Golf PGA Tour
programme.desc: The Genesis Invitational is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour in southern California, first played 95 years ago in 1926 as the Los Angeles Open. Other previous names include Northern Trust Open and Nissan Open.

programme.title: Clásica de Almería
programme.sub-title: Men, Puebla de Vícar _ Roquetas de Mar (189km)
programme.desc: The Clásica de Almería is a single-day road bicycle race held annually in February or March in Almería, Spain, starting and finishing in Almería itself. Established in 1986, the race was run as an amateur event in its first six years. In 1992, it became fully professional.

programme.desc: The Clásica de Almería is a single-day road bicycle race held annually in February or March in Almería, Spain, starting and finishing in Almería itself. Established in 1986, the race was run as an amateur event in its first six years. In 1992, it became fully professional.

programme.title: Fashion and Sports

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! AKA product Trevor Prangley takes on Falaniko "Niko" Vitale in a middleweight fight. The South African Prangley looks to take out the Hawaiin native Vitale in the tournament sime-final matchup in sunny San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: Mega Fights
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Black Panther, Lovemore Ndou, (45-8, 30 KOs) defending his IBF Junior Welterweight Title against an upstart Paul "Magic Man" Malignaggi (22-1, 5 KOs) on June 16, 2007 at the Mohegan Sun Casino in Uncasville, Connecticut, USA.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last seasons Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, in one of his toughest fights yet, challenging Miguel Cotto for the WBA super light middleweight title, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Fight Sports
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Danny Garcia looking to win the WBC super lightweight championship when he squares off with Erik Morales, but Garcia must battle back after suffering a nose injury early on. Also on the card, former world champions Hector Camacho and Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ichinojo, Daieisho and Koteoko from the Nagoya basho.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo has become one of the most popular sports in the world, it is the Olympic sports practiced by millions of people. Its aim is not only to be a competitive athletic skill, but to be mental and physical education, and to create a better society by developing the true values of sports. Judo for the World presents top competitors and various competitions around the globe, most prominent stories and fascinating events in the world of Judo.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallos decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what its like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds. Directed by Haris Usanovic with appearances by Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Conor McGregor.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Interesting documentary series that follows two MMA fighters, Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson, as they embark on an amazing adventure, traveling around the world, learning different styles of martial arts, and immersing themselves in native cultures. In each place they visit, Jimmy and Doug spend five days training with masters of the styles they are studying, and in the end, they show what theyve learned in a final demonstration or fight.

programme.title: Mega Fights
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing, historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light welterweights Amir Khan, aka King Khan, (26-1, 18 KOs) defending the WBA (Super) and IBF titles for the first time against Lamont "Havoc" Peterson (29-1, 15 KOs). It was billed as the Capital Showdown from the Convention Center in Petersons hometown of Washington, D.C., USA on December 10, 2011. After the bruising battle ended with a controversial split decision, Khans camp launched an appeal that forced the IBF to order a rematch. The rematch never happened.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights
programme.desc: This episode features welterweight champion Floyd Mayweather, Jr. in the final bout before his brief first retirement, defending against Ricky Hatton, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Fight Sports
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a welterweight world championship contest featuring Arturo Gatti and Carlos Baldomir. Baldomir looks to continue his rise in the welterweight ranks. Also on the card, a classic welterweight title brawl between Andre Berto and Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 2 featuring Mitakeumi, Ryuden, Kotoshogiku and Takarafuji from the Nagoya basho.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. Its kickboxings most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Newcastle, England, features Enfusion champion Iman Barlow (England) vs. Lara Fernandez (Spain).

programme.title: Fight Sports MMA
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by an incredible middleweight fight that ends with a tapout between Dricus Du Plessis and Rafal Haratyk. Bonus coverage includes a middleweight melee that ends in submission between Mark Hulme and Gordon Roodman and a female strawweight fight that goes the distance between Danella Eliasov and Irene Rivera.

programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last seasons Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.sub-title: Ryan Bader, Phil Davis, Roy Nelson and more!
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellators duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Italian champ Gianluca Mandras (12-4, 5 KOs) battles 26-year-old Swedish southpaw Otto Wallin (17-0, 11 KOs) for the WBA Continental Heavyweight Championship in Wallins hometown of Sundsvall in the citys premiere professional boxing event. Wallin expects to seize the title, while Mandras plans to spoil Wallins homecoming celebration at the Sporthallen arena.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: Interesting sports programme that looks at the science behind the martial arts, the body mechanics, and fighters physiological structure. The martial arts have been practiced for centuries, and this programme uses amazing animation to show viewers the power that is involved in martial arts combat.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights
programme.desc: This episode features Canelo Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, facing Ryan Rhodes, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Fight Sports
programme.desc: Check out the most savage and scariest knockouts in the history of brutal combat sports and see what fighters are capable of on their way to becoming the biggest stars. Its time to have a look at the most unexpected knockouts in fighting history, the ultimate show stoppers.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Endo, Okinoumi, Takarafuji and Shimanoumi from the Nagoya basho.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last seasons Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.sub-title: Ryan Bader, Phil Davis, Roy Nelson and more!
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellators duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: FS MMA
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! A vicious knee to the body ends this fight inside the first round when Jorge Santiago fights Trevor Prangley in San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: Kood 999
programme.desc: Pineva krimimaruli tele-esilinastus! Seltskond korrumpeerunud politseinikke satuvad eriti suurde jamasse, kui neid hakkab šantažeerima Vene maffia. Ainus viis mafiosnikega uhele poole saada on viia labi erakordselt keerukas roov. Kuigi esmapilgul paistab idee teostamatu, koorub kaabakatel lõpuks kaval plaan. Nimelt panna uhes linna otsas toime algaja politseiniku mõrv ja kui kogu linna politseiekipaažide tahelepanu on kood 999-ga ("politseinik tapetud") hõivatud, saavad ulejaanud "rapased" politseinikud linna teises otsas võimaluse roov teoks teha. Aga nagu ikka, on headel plaanidel komme teostamise faasis mitu vinti peale keerata. Film ei sobi alaealistele.

programme.title: Kuidas sa tead
programme.desc: Staarsportlane Lisa (Reese Witherspoon) on just riigi pehmepallikoondisest valja arvatud. Haritud arimees George (Paul Rudd) on saanud suudistuse finantskuriteos. Lisa potentsiaalne poiss-sõber Matty (Owen Wilson) on juhm ja igavene poissmees, Georgei tudruksõber jattis ta just maha. Parast juhuslikku kohtumist puuavad Lisa ja George uheskoos oma kibedast olukorrast valja tulla ja sellest uuest sõprusest ka midagi enamat leida.

programme.desc: Kevadine õitsemine.

programme.title: Roov muuseumis
programme.desc: Komoodia, mille keskmes on kolm muuseumi turvameest, kes parast uleviimist teise muuseumi mõtlevad valja plaani varastada tagasi kunstiteosed, millesse nad on kiindunud.

programme.title: Ricki _ rokkstaarist ema
programme.desc: Muusikaliste etteastetega palistatud draamakomoodia, peaosades kolmekordne Oscari-võitja Meryl Streep ja legendaarne Kevin Kline. Aastaid tagasi hulgas Ricky (Meryl Streep) rokkstaari unistust puudes oma mehe Petei (Kevin Kline) ja lapsed. Nuud helistab talle aga ekskaasa, kuna nende tutar Julia (Mamie Gummer) jaeti enne pulmi maha. Rokkstaarist ema jatab tuuri pooleli ja laheb tagasi pere juurde katkiseid suhteid korda seadma. Mõistagi pole see lihtne ulesanne, aga Ricki on saanud rokkari karastuse ja ajab asju talle omasel viisil. R: Jonathan Demme.

programme.title: Ilmvõimatu
programme.desc: Oscarile kandideerinud tõeliselt võimas ja kaasahaarav draama, mis põhineb uhe Hispaania perekonnaga juhtunud lool 2004. aastal. Maria (Naomi Watts, "21 grammi"), Henry (Ewan McGregor, "Trainspotting") ja nende lapsed puhkavad Tai kuurordis. Perekond lõõgastub basseini aares ja tahistab jõulusid paradiisis, kuid siis tabab kuurorti metsik tsunami. Kogu rannik kaob ning algab võitlus loodusjõududega elu ja surma peale. Intensiivne ja emotsionaalne lugu osutus kassahitiks režissoori kodumaal Hispaanias ja seda saatis suur menu ka mujal maailmas, seda nii kinolevis kui festivalidel. Lavastas Juan Antonio Bayona ("Orbudekodu").

programme.title: Koolibri efekt
programme.desc: Põnevusmarul. Sõjavaepolitsei eest jooksus ja Londonis kodutuna redutav endine erivaelane Joey Jones (Jason Statham) saab võimaluse omastada teise mehe identiteet ning teha oma elus kannapoore. Laskudes uha sugavamale Londoni kriminaalse allmaailma ragastikku mõistab Joey, et ei saa vaikides pealt vaadata umberringi lokkavat ebaõiglust. Kui bandiidid tapavad tema kallima, otsustab mees õigusemõistmise oma katesse võtta. Film ei sobi alaealistele.

programme.title: Ameerika ultra
programme.desc: Tempokas marulikomoodia! Mike (Jesse Eisenberg) on pealtnaha lootusetu logard, kelle kanepisuitsune vaikelinnaelu koos pruudi ja elukaaslase Phoebeiga (Kristen Stewart) pooratakse uhel heal paeval pea peale. Mike ei oska aimatagi, et ta on tegelikult vaga kõrgetasemelise valjaõppega agent, kes ootab enda "kaivitamist". Korraga jõuab minevik talle jarele ning Mike paisatakse keset eluohtlikku salaoperatsiooni. Selleks, et ise ellu jaada ja Phoebe kindlast surmast paasta, peab Mike ules leidma enda sisimas peituva marulikangelase ja siis valu andma, kuni keegi enam pusti ei seisa! Film ei sobi alaealistele.

programme.title: Bandiit
programme.desc: Kanada 2022 krimipõnevik Lavastaja:Allan Ungar Osades:Josh Duhamel, Mel Gibson, Elisha Cuthbert Parast Michigani vanglast põgenemist omandab võluv karjaarikurjategija Kanadas uue identiteedi ja roovib rekordilised 59 panka ja juveelipoodi, samal ajal kui politsei tooruhm teda jahtib.

programme.title: Isamees
programme.desc: Doug Harris (Josh Gad) on armastusvaarne, aga seltskondlikus mõttes kohmakas peigmees, kellel pole isameest. Doug abiellub vahem kui kahe nadala parast oma unistuste naisega (Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting) ja ta suunatakse Jimmy Callahani (Kevin Hart) juurde. Callahanile kuulub firma, mis pakub kehvadele suhtlejatele võluvaid isamehi. Tulemuseks on ulinaljakas pulmatrall, mille kaigus proovitakse pulmakulalisi edukalt haneks tõmmata. Lisaks saavad Doug ja ta võlts-isamees Jimmy ootamatult headeks sõpradeks.

programme.title: Ameerika ultra

programme.title: Sind oodates
programme.desc: Film raagib Hildy Goodist - kinnisvaramaaklerist ja Salemi nõidade jareltulijast, kes armastab veini ja oma saladusi. Tema korraparane elu hakkab muutuma, kui temas suttib taas keskkooliaegne armuleek Frank Getchelli vastu ning kui ta põimib end ohtlikult uhe inimese hoolimatusse kaitumisse. Mida eredamalt suttivad ammu unustatud tunded ja tulevad paevavalgele peresaladused, seda kiiremini soostab Hildy õiendama arveid selle uhe inimesega, keda ta on aastakumneid valtinud – iseendaga.

programme.title: Raport
programme.desc: Idealistlik USA senati ametnik Daniel J. Jones saab ulesande juhtida CIA 11. septembri jargset kinnipidamis- ja ulekuulamisprogrammi uurimist, paljastades šokeerivad saladused.

programme.title: Nõbu Rachel
programme.desc: Noor inglise aadlik Philip haub kattemaksu salaparase kaunitari Racheli vastu, uskudes, et naine murgitas tema hooldaja. Olukord võtab ootamatu poorde ja noort meest haaravad vastakad tunded, kui ta Itaaliast saabunud Rachelisse taiesti lootusetult ara armub.

programme.title: Sind oodates

programme.title: Nõbu Rachel

programme.title: Raamatupood
programme.desc: R: Isabel Coixet. O: Emily Mortimer, Bill Nighy, Patricia Clarkson jt. Draama. Inglismaa aastal 1959. Hiljuti leseks jaanud Florence Green avab konservatiivses vaikelinnas raamatupoe. Samasse majja tahab võimukas seltskonnadaam Violet Gamart rajada hoopis kunstikeskuse. Ka linnaelanikud pole suuremat kirjanduse austajad, nii et Florencei ja tema raamatupoe tulevik paistab tume. Kui aga naisel õnnestub kohalikele tutvustada oma aja skandaalsemaid teoseid, Vladimir Nabokovi "Lolitat" ja Ray Bradbury "451ͦ Fahrenheiti", hakkab linnarahvas leebuma ning kirjasõna vastu uha erksamat huvi ilmutama.

programme.title: Koolibri
programme.desc: Meespeategelase elu 1970. aastatest kuni lahitulevikuni ja lugematu arv suhteid, mis on aja jooksul tema eluteega põimunud.

programme.title: Louis Waini kassimaailm
programme.desc: Tõestisundinud lugu Louis Wainist (Benedict Cumberbatch) ekstsentrilisest ja geniaalsest kunstnikust, kes põhjustas maailmas esimese viraalse kassivaimustuse. Poolteist sajandit tagasi, millal postkaartide saatmine oli igapaevane tegevus, vallutasid uhtakki maailma tuhanded postkaardid armsate kasside piltidega ning pea kõikide nende autoriks oli Louis Wain. Selle kõrval, kuidas Wainist sai uleoo kuulus kunstnik, kellelt tanaval autogramme kusiti, ning kuidas tema karjaar aastakumnete jooksul kulges, naeb filmis ka tema suurt armulugu noorematele õdedele kasvatajannaks tulnud Emily Richardsoniga (Claire Foy).

Poolteist sajandit tagasi, millal postkaartide saatmine oli igapaevane tegevus, vallutasid uhtakki maailma tuhanded postkaardid armsate kasside piltidega ning pea kõikide nende autoriks oli Louis Wain. programme.title: Koolibri
programme.desc: Meespeategelase elu 1970. aastatest kuni lahitulevikuni ja lugematu arv suhteid, mis on aja jooksul tema eluteega põimunud.

programme.title: Tagasi Burgundiasse
programme.desc: Prantsusmaa 2017 draama komoodia Lavastaja:Cedric Klapisch Osades:Pio Marmaï, Ana Girardot, François Civil 30-aastane Jean (Pio Marmaï "Kõrvalehupe") on viimased kumme aastat mooda ilma rannanud ega ole suhelnud oma perekonnaga lapsepõlvekodus Burgundias. Kuid kui tema isa on suremas, kutsutakse ta valismaalt tagasi koju Prantsusmaale.Kaes on suve lõpp ja lahenev viinamarja saagi korjamine võimaldab Jeanil õe Julietteiga (Ana Girardot "Escobar. Kaotatud paradiis") ja venna Jeremiega (François Civil "Nagu ulal / nõnda all) suhteid soojendada ning pere viinamarjakasvanduse tulevik otsustada.Aastaaegade vaheldumisest ja veini valmistamise protsessist sõltudes taastavad siiralt ja kirglikult viinamarjakasvandusse suhtuvad vennad ja õde aasta valtel oma suhted.

programme.title: Elujanu
programme.desc: Kolm Oscarit (sealhulgas parima meespeaosa ja meeskõrvalosa Kuldmehikesed) võitnud suureparane eluloofilm. Draama keskmes on jonnakas Texase lihttooline Ron (Matthew McConaughey, "Wall Streeti hunt") - mees, kes joob, tõmbab narkotsi ja murrab naisi nii kuis jaksab. Kuid uhel hirmsal paeval diagnoositakse tal HIV ja teatatakse, et tema eeldatav eluiga on vaid uks kuu. Ron aga kihutab Mehhikosse ning viib end kurssi alternatiivsete ravimitega, mida ta USAsse smugeldama hakkab. Ta elab veel aastaid ja aitab paljusid, kes sama haiguse kaes kannatavad. Filmi lavastajaks on Jean-Marc Vallee ("Cafe de Flore"), McConaughey kõrva saravad Jared Leto ("Kaklusklubi") ja Jennifer Garner ("Juno").

programme.title: Hinga
programme.desc: Tõsielul põhinev sudamlik draama. Robin ja Diana Cavendish (Andrew Garfield ja Claire Foy) on seiklusi armastavad abikaasad, kes keelduvad alla vandumast raskele haigusele. Parast seda, kui lastehalvatus aheldab 28-aastase Robini haiglavoodisse, prognoositakse talle elu veel vaid mõneks kuuks. Ent tanu Diana kaksikvendadele Bloggsile ja Davidile (Tom Hollander) ning leiutaja Teddy Halli (Hugh Bonneville) lennukatele ideedele julgevad Robin ja Diana põgeneda haiglamuuride vahelt, et elada taisvaartuslikku elu, kasvatades oma noort poega, reisides mooda maailma ja puhendudes teiste lastehalvatuse patsientide abistamisele.

programme.title: Tagasi Burgundiasse

programme.title: Filmzone Plussi filmid
programme.desc: Filmzone Plussi filme tutvustavad treilerid.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: A game show specifically for chefs, in which a trip to the grocery store could land them $20,000! Three elimination challenges will put their skills to the max, testing culinary competence throughout the show. A panel of tough judges will rigorously watch over contestants and critic their accomplishments, to decide once and for all who is the top chef. Guy Fieri hosts the show, leading us through the chefs efforts in hope of winning the grand prize.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show
programme.desc: The Bobby And Damaris Show is an amazing source of culinary skills and fun. The hosts Bobby Flay and Damaris Phillips are both passionate about traditional American food and Southern classics. They have all kinds of recipes for the audience, best ideas for the parties and festivities, great cocktails and the latest food trends. They are good friends, who cook together, test extraordinary food ideas and entertain each other and the viewers.

programme.title: The Bobby and Damaris Show

programme.title: Kook
programme.desc: Join chefs Sunny Anderson, Jeff Mauro, Marcela Valladolid as well as chef Katie Lee and Iron Chef Geoffrey Zakarian as they show you how to make simple and delicious meals for your friends and family, while also having lots of fun together in The Kitchen. With interesting and easy recipes, incredible guests, and hilarious hosts and their amazing interaction, you will enjoy this cooking-themed talk show.

programme.title: Restaurant
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Giada kodused toimetused
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis is an outstanding culinary specialist, the author of nine New York Times bestselling cookbooks, Emmy award winning television personality and the host of Giada at Home television show. Giada has quite an impressive background of culinary training from Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, which combined with her own unique Californian charm creates her one-of-a-kind recognizable style. In Giada at Home she focuses on cooking at home for friends and family for different occasions and on party planning. Holiday feast or romantic dinner, weekend vibes or average day, it does not matter- the food is always delicious.

programme.title: Cake Wars
programme.desc: Baking show hosted by actor Jonathan Bennett, in which four expert bakers compete in making the biggest, craziest, most outrageous cakes, in order to win $10,000 prize. Each episode is centered around a certain theme or event - The Simpsons cake, DC Comics celebration cake, cakes inspired by the video game Super Mario Bros, LEGO-themed cake, the cake for the celebration of the 50th anniversary of the movie The Sound of Music, and many more incredible creations. Famous pastry chefs and judges Waylynn Lucas and Ron Ben-Israel determine which cakes are the best, and those creations are showcased at a major party or special event.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.sub-title: You Made Your Bread Now Eat It
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. programme.title: Farmhouse Rules
programme.desc: Join American chef Nancy Fuller in one of New York States favourite farmhouse kitchens as she explores the delights of scratch cooking with fresh local produce. With ingredients sourced from Hudson Valleys finest, Fuller is no stranger to serving up family-friendly meals with a drizzle of luxury and a second-helping of some of the best home-cooked food youll find in the States. Hosted from the comfort of her own kitchen, Fullers beautiful 17th-century farmhouse offers the perfect backdrop. With step-by-step instructions on how to prepare everything from the everyday dinner to a collection of timeless seasonal favourites; breakfast, lunch and dinner have never felt so indulgent.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Chopped Sweets
programme.desc: Exciting cooking competition show, spin-off of the popular Chopped and hosted by Scott Conant- celebrity chef, restaurateur and cookbook author, features four chefs who are tasked with making dessert dishes and the winner gets $10,000 prize. Every episode begins with four contestants, trained pastry chefs, who in each of the three rounds receive four mystery items that they must incorporate into their desserts, demonstrating their skill, concentration and imagination. Culinary professionals who serve as judges eliminate one chef at a time. After three rounds, a champion is named, and the winner leaves with the money.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: A game show specifically for chefs, in which a trip to the grocery store could land them $20,000! Guy Fieri hosts the show, leading us through the chefs efforts in hope of winning the grand prize.

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: Thirteen competitors decorate bouquets of cake pops for host Tamera Mowry-Housley and judge Bill Yosses. The final three must create mashup desserts.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 3. Hosts Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome ten chefs to the Tuscan villa where they will live, cook and prove their skills with Italian cuisine.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Kook
programme.desc: Join chefs Sunny Anderson, Jeff Mauro, Marcela Valladolid as well as chef Katie Lee and Iron Chef Geoffrey Zakarian as they show you how to make simple and delicious meals for your friends and family, while also having lots of fun together in The Kitchen. With interesting and easy recipes, incredible guests, and hilarious hosts and their amazing interaction, you will enjoy this cooking-themed talk show.

programme.title: Giada kodused toimetused
programme.desc: Giada De Laurentiis is an outstanding culinary specialist, the author of nine New York Times bestselling cookbooks, Emmy award winning television personality and the host of Giada at Home television show. Giada has quite an impressive background of culinary training from Le Cordon Bleu in Paris, which combined with her own unique Californian charm creates her one-of-a-kind recognizable style. In Giada at Home she focuses on cooking at home for friends and family for different occasions and on party planning. Holiday feast or romantic dinner, weekend vibes or average day, it does not matter- the food is always delicious.

programme.title: Cake Wars
programme.desc: Baking show hosted by actor Jonathan Bennett, in which four expert bakers compete in making the biggest, craziest, most outrageous cakes, in order to win $10,000 prize. Each episode is centered around a certain theme or event - The Simpsons cake, DC Comics celebration cake, cakes inspired by the video game Super Mario Bros, LEGO-themed cake, the cake for the celebration of the 50th anniversary of the movie The Sound of Music, and many more incredible creations. Famous pastry chefs and judges Waylynn Lucas and Ron Ben-Israel determine which cakes are the best, and those creations are showcased at a major party or special event.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Farmhouse Rules
programme.desc: Join American chef Nancy Fuller in one of New York States favourite farmhouse kitchens as she explores the delights of scratch cooking with fresh local produce. With ingredients sourced from Hudson Valleys finest, Fuller is no stranger to serving up family-friendly meals with a drizzle of luxury and a second-helping of some of the best home-cooked food youll find in the States. Hosted from the comfort of her own kitchen, Fullers beautiful 17th-century farmhouse offers the perfect backdrop. With step-by-step instructions on how to prepare everything from the everyday dinner to a collection of timeless seasonal favourites; breakfast, lunch and dinner have never felt so indulgent.

programme.title: Farmhouse Rules

programme.title: Restaurant
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: Ted Allen hosts this hearty American cooking show that sees four little chefs showcasing their cooking abilities as they prepare and present delicious dishes for the chance to win a whopping $10,000 cash prize. This spin off version of popular cooking competition Chopped is like a breathe of fresh air as these young prodigies bring their youthful energy and originality to the Chopped kitchen. The delicious treats and competitive format is bound to leave you wanting more.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Ciao House
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 3. Hosts Alex Guarnaschelli and Gabe Bertaccini welcome ten chefs to the Tuscan villa where they will live, cook and prove their skills with Italian cuisine.

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: The bakers begin by decorating oversized sugar cookies. Later, the three finalists must make extravagant surprise cakes for guest judge Robert Lucas.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beau geste
programme.desc: En tournage, en avant-première, dans les festivals, en France comme à letranger, sur les films intimistes comme les comedies populaires. Pierre Lescure, ancien president du Festival de Cannes, discute avec les artistes qui font lactualite dans des lieux qui font sens : salles de cinema, musees, ou encore librairies. En parallèle de ses rencontres, la redaction de "Beau Geste" couvre les evenements cinematographiques pour alimenter un feuilleton hebdomadaire en immersion dans le vaste milieu du cinema.

programme.title: Le pitch cinema
programme.desc: Chaque semaine Le Pitch Cinema vous presente 3 sorties de la semaine. Rythme et graphique, une mysterieuse silhouette en contre jour devant un grand ecran " donne les clefs aux telespectateurs pour se forger leur opinion " et decider ensuite daller voir les films… ou pas !

programme.title: Histoires courtes
programme.desc: Histoires Courtes est un programme entièrement consacre aux courts-metrages en tout genre.

programme.title: Flair de famille
programme.desc: Le cadavre dun chef dentreprise est retrouve au fond dune cour. Et un incendie criminel se declare dans une cabane perchee dans les arbres. Pour Caroline et François, les deux evenements sont lies : lhomme retrouve mort en ville etait le proprietaire de ce site idyllique au coeur de la foret. Mais qui lui en voulait au point de le tuer ? Une femme delaissee ? Un associe floue ? Un employe humilie ? François et Caroline sont bientôt convaincus que le meurtrier na pas agi seul...

programme.title: Le marchand de sable
programme.desc: Marque par des annees de prison, Djo, livreur de colis en banlieue parisienne, vit modestement chez sa mère avec sa fille. Un jour, une tante qui vient de fuir le conflit ivoirien debarque chez eux avec ses trois enfants. Dans lurgence, Djo reussit à leur trouver un local. Mais face à la demande croissante et dans la perspective doffrir une vie decente à sa fille, Djo bascule et devient marchand de sommeil.

programme.title: Meteo 2
programme.desc: Retrouvez les bulletins meteo de la chaîne France 2.

programme.title: Affaire conclue
programme.sub-title: Affaire conclue, tout le monde a quelque chose à vendre
programme.desc: Lemission à succès animee par Sophie Davant permet, à qui le veut, de proposer un objet quil souhaite vendre. Une fois retenu, lobjet est expertise par un specialiste et propose aux enchères à des acheteurs, qui sont au nombre de 5 et varient selon les emissions.

programme.title: La civilisation des arbres
programme.desc: A Chenove, lassociation "Pirouette Cacahuète" conçoit des jardins partages dans les quartiers. Ces jardins comestibles sont un lieu de vie et de decouverte pour les habitants.

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
programme.desc: Retrouvez le replay de votre emission quotidienne "Tout le monde veut prendre sa place", chaque jour sur la plateforme France TV. Six candidats affrontent un "champion" autour dune serie de jeux. Celui ou celle qui parviendra à le deloger deviendra le nouveau champion. La manche 1 senrichit dune nouveaute majeure : les QPT ! Ces "Questions Pour Tous" posees simultanement aux 6 candidats donnent un nouveau rythme, creent des surprises, renversent les scores en sajoutant aux 2 questions de chacun. Chaque candidats a desormais 4 chances de passer en deuxième manche et davancer vers le fauteuil. Une selection plus juste, avec davantage de suspense.

programme.title: Mot de passe
programme.desc: Du lundi au jeudi : 2 candidats saffrontent pour cumuler un maximum de points. Ils sont accompagnes chacun dune personnalite. Leur but : decouvrir des MOTS Chaque equipe dispute 2 manches de 30 secondes lors de laquelle il faut trouver 5 mots. A la première manche, linvite fait deviner les mots au candidat. A la 2ème manche, cest linverse. Chaque mot trouve offre 1 point au candidat. Le jeudi, tout peut basculer, les points comptent double. Lensemble des points se cumulent au fil de la semaine. Le candidat totalisant le plus grand score à la fin de lemission du jeudi se qualifie pour la Finale du vendredi. Vendredi: La Finale Elle se deroule en 2 parties. Seul le candidat qualifie et les 2 invites y participent. Pour chaque partie, le finaliste sera aide par linvite de son choix. La première partie lui permet de cumuler une somme dargent pouvant aller jusquà 1500 euros. La seconde partie lui permet de doubler cette somme. Partie 1 : pour constituer la cagnotte Elle se deroule en 3 paliers. Pour chaque palier, le finaliste doit faire deviner 5 mots à linvite en 1 minute. Il peut utiliser au maximum 3 indices pour chaque mot. Les mots proposes se reduisent au fur et à mesure des paliers : Palier 1 : 5 mots à deviner sur 8 possibles —> 500 euros Palier 2 : 5 mots à deviner sur 7 possibles —> 1000 euros Palier 3 : 5 mots à deviner sur 6 possibles —> 1500 euros Partie 2 : pour doubler la cagnotte Pour cela, le candidat doit faire deviner à linvite 10 mots en 1 minute. Linvite aura la première lettre du mot à trouver afin de laider. Si les 10 mots sont trouves, le candidat double la somme cumulee en première partie. Le finaliste peut ainsi remporter jusquà 3000 euros.

programme.title: Le 6h00 info
programme.desc: , première matinale dactualite de France, reste fidèle à son ambition dinformation, tout en etant resolument connectee à la vie et aux preoccupations des Français. Lemission, portee par une equipe de journalistes et de chroniqueurs, traitera quotidiennement une variete de thematiques, abordant lactualite avec serieux mais sans dramatisation.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Damien Thevenot reçoit les comediennes Anna Mouglalis et Irène Jacob. Anna Mouglalis est à laffiche du film " La mer au loin " de Saïd Hamich presente en seance speciale à Cannes et Irène Jacob de " Rendez-vous avec Pol Pot " du cineaste franco-cambodgien Rithy Panh.

programme.title: Journal 08h00
programme.desc: Le journal tout en images

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Damien Thevenot reçoit les comediennes Anna Mouglalis et Irène Jacob. Anna Mouglalis est à laffiche du film " La mer au loin " de Saïd Hamich presente en seance speciale à Cannes et Irène Jacob de " Rendez-vous avec Pol Pot " du cineaste franco-cambodgien Rithy Panh.

programme.title: La maison des Maternelles
programme.desc: De la perinatalite à ladolescence, de leducation à la vie de famille, aucun sujet nest tabou dans La maison des Maternelles, le rendez-vous quotidien de la famille. Lemission accompagne avec bienveillance toutes les familles, tout au long de leur parcours, que ce soit pour donner la vie, aider les bebes à bien grandir ou mieux vivre avec les enfants et petits-enfants.

programme.title: La maison des Maternelles à votre service
programme.desc: De nombreuses rubriques font le tour de lactualite de la petite enfance, de la famille et de la parentalite, en compagnie de professionnels de lenfance, de temoins et dexperts. Des conseils au jour le jour, des decryptages et des tests de produits destines aux plus petits complètent le dispositif.

programme.title: Consomag
programme.desc: Une emission de lInstitut national de la consommation.

programme.title: Meteo Outre-mer
programme.desc: Le point sur levolution de la meteo dans les Outre-mers, grâce à des cartes et des explications.

programme.title: Chacun son tour
programme.desc: Des participants tires au sort parmi le public doivent repondre à des questions de culture generale dans lespoir detre qualifie pour la deuxième epreuve : le billard japonais, un jeu dadresse qui peut rapporter cadeaux et argent. Les candidats qui perdent leur duel de culture generale reintègrent le public et peuvent donc etre à nouveau tires au sort, afin de retenter leur chance et accumuler les gains. Les candidats quitteront le jeu lorsquils reussissent à remporter la cagnotte en fin demission.

programme.title: Chacun son tour

programme.title: Basique, lessentiel de la musique
programme.desc: Du lundi au vendredi sur France 2, à 20h35

programme.title: Mot de passe
programme.desc: Du lundi au jeudi : 2 candidats saffrontent pour cumuler un maximum de points. Ils sont accompagnes chacun dune personnalite. Leur but : decouvrir des MOTS Chaque equipe dispute 2 manches de 30 secondes lors de laquelle il faut trouver 5 mots. A la première manche, linvite fait deviner les mots au candidat. A la 2ème manche, cest linverse. Chaque mot trouve offre 1 point au candidat. Le jeudi, tout peut basculer, les points comptent double. Lensemble des points se cumulent au fil de la semaine. Le candidat totalisant le plus grand score à la fin de lemission du jeudi se qualifie pour la Finale du vendredi. Vendredi: La Finale Elle se deroule en 2 parties. Seul le candidat qualifie et les 2 invites y participent. Pour chaque partie, le finaliste sera aide par linvite de son choix.

programme.title: Surm loob maale
programme.desc: Au fin fond des catacombes de Paris, une jeune femme deguisee en vampire est retrouvee assassinee, etendue dans un cercueil, un pieux enfonce dans le coeur. Près du cadavre ainsi mis en scène, on trouve une reproduction du tableau "Vampire", du peintre norvegien Edvard Munch. Antoine et Florence decident denqueter au sein de la troupe de theâtre dans laquelle la victime, qui etait comedienne, jouait. Mais, pour le duo, il est de plus en plus difficile de travailler efficacement lorsque les sentiments sen melent…

programme.title: Surm loob maale
programme.desc: Un mysterieux interlocuteur envoie une lettre contenant des coordonnees GPS à Antoine, entraînant le capitaine Verlay et Florence Chassagne dans un jeu de pistes autour de loeuvre de Gustave Courbet. A chaque enigme resolue, un nouveau cadavre est decouvert. Une question simpose : pourquoi le meurtrier sadresse-t-il personnellement à Antoine, alors meme que ce dernier ny entend rien en art ? Il va devoir trouver sa voie pour pouvoir conserver son poste...

programme.title: Surm loob maale
programme.desc: Lenquete a des retombees sur les proches dAntoine, indirectement menaces par Jerôme Kalanski, qui rend visite à sa femme et ses enfants. Cette dernière est en colère et demande à Antoine de prendre de la distance avec son travail. Jerôme semble en savoir long sur le passe du capitaine. Il declare avoir ses sources à la PJ...

programme.title: Expression directe
programme.desc: Organisations syndicales, partis politiques, mais aussi mouvements dentrepreneurs prennent la parole.

programme.title: Surm loob maale
programme.desc: Julie Delmas, la conceptrice dun jeu de realite virtuelle est retrouvee assassinee dans son bureau. Pour mener lenquete, Antoine et Florence vont devoir resoudre les enigmes de ce jeu consacre à lunivers du peintre Jean-Auguste-Dominique Ingres, un jeu qui semble mysterieusement susciter bien des convoitises. Le duo plonge ainsi dans le monde sensuel et colore dun des plus grands artistes français de la première moitie du XIXe siècle. Mais Patricia Richter, une celèbre autrice de best-sellers, venue observer le travail de lOCBC pour son prochain roman, ne facilite pas leur travail. Car, pour inspirer la romancière, rien de tel que la relation pleine dambiguïtes et de non-dits entre Florence et Antoine…

programme.title: Surm loob maale
programme.desc: Antoine Verlay reçoit un appel anonyme dun restaurateur de tableaux qui affirme etre victime dune intrusion à son domicile, où se trouve une toile dune valeur de trente millions deuros. Le policier se lance à la poursuite du voleur, qui lui echappe. Il parvient neanmoins à mettre la main sur le tableau, au moment où le voleur le jette dans une benne à ordure. Le proprietaire de loeuvre est retrouve mort. Quand Florence Chassagne decouvre les degâts, elle est effaree, car il sagit dune oeuvre du grand maître impressionniste Claude Monet. Heureusement, elle comprend bientôt quil sagit dun faux. Mais dans ce cas, pourquoi la peinture a-t-elle ete volee ?...

programme.title: Surm loob maale

programme.desc: Le point sur levolution de la meteo dans les Outre-mers, grâce à des cartes et des explications.

programme.title: La civilisation des arbres
programme.desc: A Chenove, lassociation "Pirouette Cacahuète" conçoit des jardins partages dans les quartiers. Ces jardins comestibles sont un lieu de vie et de decouverte pour les habitants.

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
programme.desc: Retrouvez le replay de votre emission quotidienne "Tout le monde veut prendre sa place", chaque jour sur la plateforme France TV. Six candidats affrontent un "champion" autour dune serie de jeux. Celui ou celle qui parviendra à le deloger deviendra le nouveau champion. La manche 1 senrichit dune nouveaute majeure : les QPT ! Ces "Questions Pour Tous" posees simultanement aux 6 candidats donnent un nouveau rythme, creent des surprises, renversent les scores en sajoutant aux 2 questions de chacun. Chaque candidats a desormais 4 chances de passer en deuxième manche et davancer vers le fauteuil. Une selection plus juste, avec davantage de suspense.

programme.title: Mot de passe
programme.desc: Du lundi au jeudi : 2 candidats saffrontent pour cumuler un maximum de points. Ils sont accompagnes chacun dune personnalite. Leur but : decouvrir des MOTS Chaque equipe dispute 2 manches de 30 secondes lors de laquelle il faut trouver 5 mots. A la première manche, linvite fait deviner les mots au candidat. A la 2ème manche, cest linverse. Chaque mot trouve offre 1 point au candidat. Le jeudi, tout peut basculer, les points comptent double. Lensemble des points se cumulent au fil de la semaine. Le candidat totalisant le plus grand score à la fin de lemission du jeudi se qualifie pour la Finale du vendredi. Vendredi: La Finale Elle se deroule en 2 parties. Seul le candidat qualifie et les 2 invites y participent. Pour chaque partie, le finaliste sera aide par linvite de son choix. La première partie lui permet de cumuler une somme dargent pouvant aller jusquà 1500 euros. La seconde partie lui permet de doubler cette somme. Partie 1 : pour constituer la cagnotte Elle se deroule en 3 paliers. Pour chaque palier, le finaliste doit faire deviner 5 mots à linvite en 1 minute. Il peut utiliser au maximum 3 indices pour chaque mot. Les mots proposes se reduisent au fur et à mesure des paliers : Palier 1 : 5 mots à deviner sur 8 possibles —> 500 euros Palier 2 : 5 mots à deviner sur 7 possibles —> 1000 euros Palier 3 : 5 mots à deviner sur 6 possibles —> 1500 euros Partie 2 : pour doubler la cagnotte Pour cela, le candidat doit faire deviner à linvite 10 mots en 1 minute. Linvite aura la première lettre du mot à trouver afin de laider. Si les 10 mots sont trouves, le candidat double la somme cumulee en première partie. Le finaliste peut ainsi remporter jusquà 3000 euros.

programme.title: Le 6h00 info
programme.desc: , première matinale dactualite de France, reste fidèle à son ambition dinformation, tout en etant resolument connectee à la vie et aux preoccupations des Français. Lemission, portee par une equipe de journalistes et de chroniqueurs, traitera quotidiennement une variete de thematiques, abordant lactualite avec serieux mais sans dramatisation.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Damien Thevenot reçoit les comediennes Anna Mouglalis et Irène Jacob. Anna Mouglalis est à laffiche du film " La mer au loin " de Saïd Hamich presente en seance speciale à Cannes et Irène Jacob de " Rendez-vous avec Pol Pot " du cineaste franco-cambodgien Rithy Panh.

programme.title: Journal 08h00
programme.desc: Le journal tout en images

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Damien Thevenot reçoit les comediennes Anna Mouglalis et Irène Jacob. Anna Mouglalis est à laffiche du film " La mer au loin " de Saïd Hamich presente en seance speciale à Cannes et Irène Jacob de " Rendez-vous avec Pol Pot " du cineaste franco-cambodgien Rithy Panh.

programme.title: La maison des Maternelles
programme.desc: De la perinatalite à ladolescence, de leducation à la vie de famille, aucun sujet nest tabou dans La maison des Maternelles, le rendez-vous quotidien de la famille. Lemission accompagne avec bienveillance toutes les familles, tout au long de leur parcours, que ce soit pour donner la vie, aider les bebes à bien grandir ou mieux vivre avec les enfants et petits-enfants.

programme.title: La maison des Maternelles à votre service
programme.desc: De nombreuses rubriques font le tour de lactualite de la petite enfance, de la famille et de la parentalite, en compagnie de professionnels de lenfance, de temoins et dexperts. Des conseils au jour le jour, des decryptages et des tests de produits destines aux plus petits complètent le dispositif.

programme.title: Consomag
programme.desc: Une emission de lInstitut national de la consommation.

programme.title: La banlieue cest le paradis
programme.desc: Lhistoire des banlieues à travers des archives à toutes les epoques, pour ancrer la narration dans le passe et donner à voir levolution des convictions de chacun de nos Presidents sur le sujet. Mais le fil conducteur de ce film, ce seront aussi les " rencontres " queffectuera Mohamed Bouhafsi sur le terrain, en sequence, avec ses intervenants, ses proches parfois. Loccasion de raconter, entre les lignes, sa propre histoire qui viendra eclairer sa demonstration.

programme.title: Tondipuudjad
programme.desc: "Tondipuudjate" universumi jargmise peatuki toovad ekraanidele lavastaja Jason Reitman ja produtsent Ivan Reitman. Filmis "Tondipuudjad: parand" saabub uksikema oma kahe lapsega vaikelinna, kus nad avastavad sideme algsete tondipuudjatega ning vanaisa jaetud salajase parandi. Stsenaariumi autorid on Jason Reitman ja Gil Kenan

programme.title: Un dimanche à la campagne
programme.desc: Loin du tumulte mediatique, Frederic Lopez invite quelques celebrites le temps dun week-end afin de leur offrir un moment hors du temps propice aux confidences. Entre emotion et fous rires, chacun se devoile. Plusieurs temps forts rythment ce rendez-vous atypique, qui permet à des vedettes du petit ecran apprecies par les telespectateurs de se livrer en toute confiance, grâce à la bienveillance du maître des lieux, plein dempathie et dhumanite. Un rendez-vous plein demotion et dhumour, qui permet de mieux connaître les parcours des invites.

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
programme.desc: Retrouvez le replay de votre emission quotidienne "Tout le monde veut prendre sa place", chaque jour sur la plateforme France TV. Six candidats affrontent un "champion" autour dune serie de jeux. Celui ou celle qui parviendra à le deloger deviendra le nouveau champion. La manche 1 senrichit dune nouveaute majeure : les QPT ! Ces "Questions Pour Tous" posees simultanement aux 6 candidats donnent un nouveau rythme, creent des surprises, renversent les scores en sajoutant aux 2 questions de chacun. Chaque candidats a desormais 4 chances de passer en deuxième manche et davancer vers le fauteuil. Une selection plus juste, avec davantage de suspense.

programme.title: Truth or Fake
programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort whats true from whats fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation. They educate the viewers and discourage people from sharing the news or talking about something they do not know for sure is true. Check some real examples of fake news and see how to detect when images have been falsified or words taken out of context.

programme.title: Truth or Fake
programme.desc: In our fast-moving challenging world it is of fundamental importance to sort whats true from whats fake online. The Truth or Fake is a short program designed to alert everyone to the dangers of fake news. The hosts emphasize that media literacy is a key part of the broad fight against disinformation. They educate the viewers and discourage people from sharing the news or talking about something they do not know for sure is true. Check some real examples of fake news and see how to detect when images have been falsified or words taken out of context.

programme.title: Keha kui asitõend
programme.desc: Rikas investeerimisfondi juht Gerry Roberts on kohtu all miljardi dollari valjapetmise eest. Siis ta roovitakse kohtust ja seejuures saab kohtu ees surma meeleavaldaja. Kas Gerry surm on aga lavastatud?

programme.title: Kummituselausuja
programme.desc: Melinda aitab kummitust, kes ootamatult elusana valja ilmub. See kisub Melinda ohtliku kattemaksuplaani haardesse ja ta peab võitlema ootamatute vaenlastega.

programme.title: Kummituselausuja
programme.desc: Haiglas mollava poltergeisti uurimine viib Melinda kokkupõrkeni uleloomulike jõududega, kes tema poega terroriseerivad.

programme.title: Kõikjal ainult sina
programme.desc: Oma sunnipaeval vannub Selin, et hoiab saladusi Demiri kohta, ja kohtub ohtliku kulalisega. Demir asub tegutsema, kui saab teada, Selin on saanud jalile Alara saladustele. Kui Selin ja Demir saavad uksteisele lahedasemaks, sunnib Selini ulestunnistus Demiri ootamatut otsust tegema.

programme.title: Kõikjal ainult sina
programme.desc: Demir saab teada, et Vedatile meeldima hakanud naine on Selin. Ta on vaga vihane Selini peale, kelle valetamine selle viis, ja naeb Pariisis toimuvat esitlust võimalust põgenemiseks. Selin, kes ei suuda Demiri reaktsiooni leevendada, ei suuda leppida, et viimane laheb koos Alaraga. Ajal, mil Alara teeb suuri plaane oma reisiks Pariisi, avastab Vedat, et Demir on hakanud distantsi hoidma ja kutsub teda naost-nakku kohtuma.

programme.title: Resident
programme.desc: Parast viit aastat mittesuhtlemist kohtub Conrad taas Nici isaga, sest viimane peab aarmiselt madala pulsisageduse tõttu Chastaini tulema. Billie soovitab oma patsiendil operatsiooni mitte teha, kuid patsiendi perekond eirab tema soovitust. Samal ajal kogub Cade julgust, et Ianiga tema sõltuvusest raakida ning Leela tunneb Padma parast muret.

programme.title: Resident
programme.desc: Kuulus kardiotorakaalkirurg, kes on juhtumisi dr Yamada mentor, tuleb sudamevalu parast Chastaini. Samal ajal toob Kit uudise, et eelarvekarpe tõttu ei saa EMO-s traumapatsiente enam vastu võtta ning Devon ja Conrad aitavad segaduses naist ravida.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Alex loodab Pac-Gen Northi investoritele muljet avaldada, kuid kui ta kuuleb hairivaid uudiseid luukerede kohta ehitusplatsil, palub ta Richardi abi tahelepanu kõrvale juhtimisel. Teddy tunneb survet olla superema, kuna ta seadis endale ulesande Allisonile ja Leole ise Halloweeni kostuumid teha. Meredith kardab, et ei jõua lastega kommilunimise ajaks koju. Jackson tegeleb pediaatriapatsiendiga, kes on endast valjas, kuna peab Halloweeni haiglas veetma.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Catherine naaseb linna. Tema suhe Richardiga on jahenenud, uhtlasi pole tal aimugi sellest, mis toimub Jacksoni ja Maggie vahel. Owen ja Amelia ravivad keldris kukkunud naist ning taipavad kiiresti, et lugu on keerulisem; Maggie saab šokina teada mõnest Richardi sugulasest, kes otsivad abi.

programme.title: Resident
programme.desc: Tugev torm põhjustab laastava helikopteriõnnetuse, mistõttu on EMO-s usna palju rahvast. Conrad, Devon ja teised Chastaini arstid peavad kiiresti appi tõttama patsientidele, kelle seas on helikopteri piloot, barista ning Chastaini silmis kõige ebameeldivam inimene - kuberner Mark Betz.

programme.title: Resident
programme.desc: Conrad peab Gigi kuuendalt sunnipaevalt lahkuma, sest Sammie tuleb 40-kraadise palavikuga Chastaini ning Kitil tuleb teenevõlg sisse nõuda. Samal ajal jõuab hooaja viimases osas kuberner Betzi siirdamisoperatsiooniks vajalik suda.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Meredith seisab silmitsi arstliku komisjoniga - tema tulevik arstina on ebakindel ning ta on sunnitud minevikuga keerulistel viisidel rahu tegema. Samal ajal pannakse internid proovile - mõnede raviarstide araolekul puuab igauks neist oma erialal kõige edukam olla.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Jo hakkab varjupaigas vabatahtlikuks ning saab kõne 19. jaama jaetud imiku kohta. Samal ajal liigub Meredith parast arstlikus komisjonis kaimist oma eluga edasi. Jackson astub oma varskes armuloos Viciga suure sammu, samal ajal kui Bailey ja Amelia vahetavad rasedusuudiseid.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Depoo 19 meeskond asub tegutsema, kui tugev tornaado raputab Seattleit. Keset kaost avastab meeskond puu alla maetud ehmatava leiu ning poliitilisel uritusel kaivituvad Travise kiirreageerimisinstinktid.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Travis arutab oma positsiooni linnapeaks kandideerimisel, sest on otsustanud Dixonist lahti saada, Maya aga tunnistab valjapressimist. Samal ajal kutsutakse meeskond lagunenud korterikompleksi tulekahju kustutama, mis paljastab murettekitava põhjuse.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Mika ja Teddy võtavad vastu patsiendi lahedalasuvast vanglast; Catherine vaidlustab Linki ja Monica raviplaani olulise isiku jaoks; Bailey puuab integreerida wellnessi residentuuri programmi.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Politse kutsub endale appi Richard Castle, et lahendada kahte mõrva, mis sarnanevad tema raamatutes kirjeldatule. Teda kusitleb detektiiv Kate Beckett. Nende vahel tekkiv konflikt toob kaasa nii ohu kui romantika.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Ehitusplatsilt leitakse metallvarraste alt surnuks kulmunud naine. Castle ja Beckett asuvad taas lahendama aastatetagust mõistatuslikku kuritegu ning ohvri minevikuga tutvudes peab ka Beckett seisma silmitsi enda elus toimunuga.

programme.title: Keha kui asitõend
programme.desc: Vaimuhaiglas mõrvatakse skisofreeniline tudruk. Megan ja Tommy kuulavad ule noore patsiendi, kes naib olevat selge mõistusega, kuid vaidab, et tapja eesmark oli mõrvata hoopis tema.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Maya tegeleb lahendamata pereprobleemidega, ning meeskonnal tuleb võtta vastutus enda katte kui nad seisavad silmitsi elu või surma kusimusega. Samal ajal pannakse ka proovile Andy ja Sullivani abielu.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Uutel valimistel kandideeriva New Yorgi linnavoliniku surnukeha veereb kokkurullitud vaibast otse Beckettii toimikutesse. Koos Castleiga suundutakse rapase poliitika maailma.

programme.title: M.O.D.O.K

programme.title: M.O.D.O.K
programme.desc: M.O.D.O.K. ja Monica asuvad vastumeelselt uhiselt võitlusesse sooviga umber lukata GRUMBL-i kontroll AIM-i ule. Nende keeruline omavaheline ajalugu ahvardab nende uhiste eesmarkideni jõudmist takistada, kui nad puuavad lahendada oma vimma neile ainuomasel viisil - hullude teadlaste võitlusega!

programme.title: Kattemaks
programme.desc: Emily Thorne rendib Southamptonis kodu, kus ta kunagi oma isaga elas, ja lukkab oma plaani kaima.

programme.title: Kattemaks
programme.desc: Emily asub toole oma jargmise sihtmargi kallal, kelleks on endine peresõber, kes tunnistas tema isa vastu; Victoria puuab leida rohkem infot Emily kohta.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: "Depoo 19" kolmanda hooaja esilinastusel "Grey anatoomiaga" ristunud episoodi teine osa.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Richard saab teada, et Maggie tuli Grey Sloanist ara, ning teda teeb murelikuks Maggie kaitumine parast seda, kui uks ta patsientidest - Maggie enda nõbu - sureb. Bailey naaseb toole parast isiklike asjade jaoks puhkuse võtmist, kuid Koracick teeb ta esimese toopaeva oodatust raskemaks. Meredith arvab, et tunneb DeLucast puudust. Amelial on Linkile oma raseduse kohta uudiseid.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Depoo 19 meeskond suundub liiklusõnnetuse sundmuskohale, kus kaks teismelist on jaanud elektriautosse lõksu. Olukord muutub uha pingelisemaks, kui kohale ilmub teismelise poja peale vihane isa, sest poiss on luba kusimata tema armastatud auto võtnud. Ben ja Maya satuvad peretuli keskmesse, mis puudutab paari, keda nad ei salli.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Maya ja Theo vastavad Halloweeni karnevali ajal valjakutsele, kuid kui maisilaburindis puhkeb tulekahju, muutub kõik kiiresti ohtlikumaks ning Maya riskib oma eluga, et tõestada uha vaenulikumale kaptenile oma vaartust. Depoo 19 võõrustab naabruskonna kommi pommivaid lapsi, majas puhkeb naljasõda ning Jacki painab minevikust parit kummitus.

programme.title: Depoo 19
programme.desc: Kui Vic aitab oma vanematel raskest kaotusest ule saada, peavad nad maha vestluse mustanahaliste angistavast olukorrast Ameerikas.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Leitakse rituaali kaigus piinatud ja tapetud immigrandi laip, mis viib Becketti uurima saladuslikku Voduni religiooni. Castle on oma raamatute jaoks sarnaseid mõrvu uurinud ning tema teadmised ja allikad osutuvad nuud vaga vaartuslikuks.

programme.title: Keha kui asitõend
programme.desc: Philadelphias kukub alla lennuk, kui selle pardal on tuli avatud. Katastroof mõjutab ka linna elektrivõrku.

programme.title: Mõrvad meie majas
programme.desc: Narvesoova aikesetormi ajal viivad kõik teed trio tagasi Goosebury teatrisse. Oma hirmust variseva teejuhi Howardiga puuavad nad leida legendaarset kummitust, kes on teatris kummitanud mitme põlvkonna valtel. Boo!

programme.title: Mõrvad meie majas
programme.desc: Charles leiab olulise vihje ullatava paritolu. Oliveri uksele koputab Broadway ikoon. Mabel moodustab alternatiivse kolmiku, et leida juhtlõnga, mis heidab valgust Beni vendade ja CoBro ajaloole.

programme.title: Grey anatoomia
programme.desc: Ootamatult keeruline juhtum aratab Simoneis valusaid malestusi. Jules ja Blue sõlmivad suure panusega kihlveo selle ule, kes suudab oma protseduuripaeviku esimesena lõpetada. Richard kahtlustab, et Winston valdib teda.
